thread.title: Take Away Trump's Unsecured Android Phone!
thread.title_full: Take Away Trump's Unsecured Android Phone!

title: Take Away Trump's Unsecured Android Phone!
text: by: Kelsey B target: Donald Trump After a whole election cycle of whining about Hillary Clinton's unsecured communication devices while Secretary of State, Donald Trump is still using his unsecured android device as President of The United States. Not only is this extremely hypocritical, but it is a threat to national security. Trump has proven again and again that he doesn't respect the intelligence agencies in our country. This means he is unlikely to take seriously which pieces of information must be protected and which do not. This makes for a scary combination. Sign this petition to demand that Trump stops using his personal, unsecured android phone and commits to using only protecting forms of communication.
